# TASK::GET_PHONE_GESTURE_ANIM_TOTAL_TIME

## Summary
Returns current total duration of the phone gesture anim currently playing. Will return -1.0f if no anim is playing

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **FLOAT**
